name: EMP Projector, Snub, Prototype (PSnEmpPj-10)
description: Prototype version of the snub EMP projector. The EMP projector fires a directed electromagnetic pulse which fries electronic circuits and Ablinds sophonts who have Awareness.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
